title: Sancte Diaboli: Part One
description: The Devil comes with baggage, and not the kind you can lose. I was two years old when he saved me. I didn’t understand much at that age, but I remember the pale boy with hair as dark as ink, saving me from two evils. He said he would protect me; I just didn’t know he meant from himself. I was raised in the arms of evil, tailored for the Devil like a custom Armani suit, and every day he wore it like a weapon. Brantley thought by keeping me locked in his manor that it would protect me, and it did.Until it didn’t.As I slowly adapt to The Elite Kings Club and the dark, sinister world that exists around the outlaws in suits, I come to learn that the monster everyone fears is the very same one I crave.Like a prized trophy, I sit on his throne…Something quite pretty, an object he owns…She’s a porcelain doll, so shiny, so clean…Something I want to polish, but to never be seen…The time has come, I am in his world…Now his Dea, can be admired by all…The thing with porcelain is it’s fragile and delicate…It would only take a second for me to eradicate it…
author: Amo Jones
